results.title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate: a multimedia course for learning Italian
results.creator_credit: BBC Books and Denise De Rome
results.brief_description: The course book is divided into two levels, each of five units. Each unit contains conversations, key phrases, language patterns and a variety of exercises, including special vocabulary building sections. Each level is followed by grammar summaries, additional exercises and a “Cultura” section introducing some Italian paintings and poetry. The book accompanies the video and audio cassettes which may be borrowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate: a multimedia course for learning Italian
results.brief_description: This set of audio cassettes contain all the conversations from the course book as well as ten profile interviews recorded in Italy for the course. Learners are encouraged to take part in the conversational activities intended to develop their ability to understand and speak Italian. The cassettes are designed to be used with the course book, but can be used independently. The course book and videos may be borrowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate. Episodes 16-20
results.brief_description: A continuation of “Italianissimo 1”. The episodes focus on talking about oneself and interests, taking part in discussions, expressing an opinion, looking at topics of conversation such as the relationship between the sexes and politics. The program also reviews the units as a whole, as well as focusing on cultural topics, local customs and some tourist destinations. Audio cassettes and a manual complement the videos and can be borowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Italianissimo 2: intermediate. Episodes 11-15
results.brief_description: A continuation of “Italianissimo 1”. The episodes look at asking for advice, talking about your health, making arrangements, making polite requests, talking about interests and holidays, visiting Rome, as well as providing insight into the local customs and culture of different areas of Italy. Audio cassettes and a manual complement the videos and can be borowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Italianissimo 1: beginners: a multimedia course for learning italian
results.brief_description: The books contain most of the conversations recorded in the video episodes of the series. The “Teacher’s edition” gives detailed notes with additional material as well as lesson plans and optional exercises. The “Student’s edition” reviews material in the course with language exercises and notes on italian life and culture. The videos and audio-cassettes may be loaned as separate items. The author of the two texts is Denise De Rome.

results.title: Italianissimo 1: beginners: a BBC course for beginners in italian.
results.brief_description: Four cassettes which accompany the BBC language program on video. They contain conversations recorded for the television series, explanations and exercises, and additional authentic Italian. The student is encouraged to take part in conversational exercises designed to develop comprehension and vocabulary. The cassettes can be used in conjunction with the tapes and texts or by themselves. The videos and texts are available for loan as separate items.

results.title: Italianissimo 1: beginners. Eps 6-10
results.brief_description: A multimedia language course which intorduces students to the idioms, grammar customs and scenery of Italy. The five episodes on this tape are entitled: “Il mondo della musica” which looks at using the telephone; “A casa nostra” looks at inside the home, making dates and talking about places; “Che giornata” looks at polite requests, apologising, commiserating, asking and giving directions”; “A caccia di funghi” looks at quantity, expressions of love, fear and hate; and “La Moda” which looks at buying clothes and price. Featured in these episodes are Italian fashion, regional food and the regions of Emilia and Romagna. Four audio-cassettes, and teacher and student textbooks are avilable and can be booked as separate items.

results.title: Italianissimo 1: beginners. Eps 1-5
results.brief_description: An italian multimedia language programe which develops the student’s understanding of the grammar and idioms of italian, as well as showing the countryside and customs of Italy. This tape comprises 5 episodes entitled “Immagini” which deals with italian sounds and simple expressions; “In famiglia e fra amici” which deals with making simple enquiries and formal and informal language; “In tempo libero” looks at how to relate information about oneself; “I pendolari” deals with time, jobs and work; and “Vivere in citta” looks at shopping. Family life, sports and hobbies, dialects and the city of Bologna are featured in these episodes. Teacher and student texts and a series of audio-cassettes are available and can be borrowed as separate loan items.

results.title: Italian settlement in the Yarra Valley
results.creator_credit: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Maria McCarthy recalls the stories from her youth, the ones told about her families’ voyage from Italy to Australia and settling in the Yarra Valley. She tells of her parents’ adoption of a new culture and way of life and the legacy of those decisions on the present.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maria McCarthy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
